<title level="1" right="Rules">[Ability Boosts](/Rules.aspx?ID=146)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 68 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
At 5th level and every 5 levels thereafter, your character boosts four different ability scores. Your character can use these ability boosts to increase their ability scores above 18. Boosting an ability score increases it by 1 if it’s already 18 or above, or by 2 if it starts out below 18. For more about ability boosts and applying them during character creation, see [here](/Rules.aspx?ID=75).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
